data.title: Find the One
data.statement: The principle of the game is simple: you just need to output the first letter of each word that appears in the string. If it contains a randomly placed digit  within, display an asterisk times the found number after the first letter of that word.

data.constraints:
A word contains at most one digit, and in such a case the digit is an integer between 0 and 9.
A word is a block of characters not containing a space.
A word never starts with a digit.
Each digit is written in full! Apart from those found in words.
data.inputDescription: <<Line 1>>: A string [[string]] containing multiple [[words]], which may themselves contain a digit.
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1>>: A string containing the first letter of each word, along with asterisk times the found number in the word, separated by dashes.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

The principle of the game is simple: you just need to output the first letter of each word that appears in the string. If it contains a randomly placed digit within, display an asterisk times the found number after the first letter of that word.
Input
Line 1: A string string containing multiple words, which may themselves contain a digit.
Output
Line 1: A string containing the first letter of each word, along with asterisk times the found number in the word, separated by dashes.
Constraints
A word contains at most one digit, and in such a case the digit is an integer between 0 and 9.
A word is a block of characters not containing a space.
A word never starts with a digit.
Each digit is written in full! Apart from those found in words.
Example
Input
Hello worl2d!
Output
H-w**
